segments.text: Yes . In 1996 I received my Bachelor of Science degree from Hebes University , and in 2001 I received my MBA degree from Peking University .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about your academic records at college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In fact my records were excellent . My overall GPA was 9 on a 10 scale , which was the highest in my class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's very impressive . Which course did you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: English . It was both interesting and useful , so I showed a great interest in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me why you changed your major when you were a graduate student ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I am very interested in administration and I did take some courses in it . I also performed well in the subjects . Hence I believe that I can do a good job in this position .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you get any honors and awards at college ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I was awarded a scholarship from the university every year . In 1995 I participated in the National Contest of Maths Models and I won the prize .
segments.speaker: S2
